About us
3DES

Is a custom design & manufacturing company Headquartered in Montreal - Quebec. Helping customers from different sectors with Consulting, design prototyping, manufacturing and import of consumer and medical products.

We work with local and offshore partners to get Canadian companies across the provinces and territories the best suitable solutions for their demands.

  • Visual Displays
